summary: Rolff Stoen Fist is a character most entering Windhelm may wish to kill. Sadly he is essential. This mod makes him killable
descriptionHtml:
I have played many characters who walk into Windhelm for the first time and see Rolff Stone Fist, belittling and harassing a dark elf. 

You draw your sword in honor? Well, it wont do anything, as he is set to essential and cannot die.

Give yourself the satisfaction of ending the misery of this racist man. 

This Mod simply makes him non-essential.

A quick warning. Everything in this game has consequences. I\'m quite sure he was set to essential because he can potentially be used for a Radiant Quest, I\'ve never had an instance of it, but I\'m sure there are others who have, so this would conflict with that.
author: Cyrus224
